sentences: Aune ja Eeva sõitsid palgikelgu kandadel priiküüdiga koolini.
context: The Estonian word 'kanna' has multiple meanings. It primarily refers to the heel or bottom part of something, such as the heel area of a foot (jalapöia tagumine osa), the heel/bottom part of shoes/socks, or the rear/lower portion attached to something. In one specific context, it can refer to the rear platform of a vehicle where people can stand.
